events.name: エネミーシンボル：固定
events.note: <PsensorF:3><HMすり抜け禁止><HM8方向移動禁止>

parameters.text:
She promised me.
　　　If I could gather enough materials for her,
　　　she won't lay a hand on that girl.
　　　And so I cut them up.

　　　The first time, I felt like throwing up.
　　　The second was scary, but I got used to it.
　　　After the third, I can't remember anymore.

parameters: Text =    　　　She promised me. 　　　If I could gather en...

parameters.text:
I believed in that promise and kept going.
　　　I hadn't been feeling well recently, but
　　　even still I must keep cutting.

　　　Maybe it's gotten so much easier now
　　　because I had gotten used to it.

parameters: Text =    　　　I believed in that promise and kept going. ...

parameters.text:
Suddenly, there was a big noise.
　　　I suffered a shock and lost consciousness.
　　　Did something happen outside?

　　　When I woke up, no one was there.
　　　The room was a mess, felt like an earthquake.

　　　That girl  Whe re   is  s h e ?

parameters: Text =    　　　Suddenly, there was a big noise. 　　　I su...
Look at the floor over there.
Was it really that red before...?
Did you hide on the shelf over there?
Thank god that thing wasn't persistent.
It felt like a savage murderer...
I'm relieved that you guys defeated it.
That said, I'm sure it'll revive someday...
Just whose are these bloodstains, then?
She was at the Wraith's feet when I was attacked.
She slipped away while I hid.
Then this one's likely an ally.
Looks like she's taken a liking to you.
You seem to understand my greatness, not bad.
It's fine, it's not like we lose anything.
So, what's your name, little one?
Doesn't seem like she can speak.
Well, most liquid monsters are like that, really.
It's trying its best to pronounce its name.
Well then, I'll go back to the village.
Thank you very much for your time.
Well then, perhaps we'll meet elsewhere.

　　　I suffered a shock and lost consciousness.
　　　Did something happen outside?

　　　The room was a mess, felt like an earthquake.

　　　That girl  Whe re   is  s h e ?

parameters: Text =    　　　Suddenly, there was a big noise. 　　　I su...
Hey, what is the Wraith like, really?
A terrifying and cruel figure, no doubt.
It kidnaps the residents in the snowy fields...
then only releases them a couple days later.
The freed ones are found with limbs and heads missing.
It is fearsome because we don't know.
T-this Wraith's more dangerous than I thought...
To think it could be here right now...
Don't worry, Fiede. I'll protect you.
H-hey, don't try to act cool all of a sudden.
I'll do some more research around here.
I have a strange feeling about this.
You guys go and check the other areas.
We'll gather and share information later.
\C[17]Ruins in the Snow\C[0]'s details have been updated.
Just what is the Wraith like, I wonder.
Even if I can't defeat it, I'd atleast
love to gather some info for my peers.
When you come back, should I be dead,
Joakim, you don't need to wait too long
Oi, don't pull flags off the ground.
I can't seem to get the book out...
A tool for some kind of experiment... Perhaps.
